alert.note: Alert for Barton; Cedar; Dade; Jasper; Lawrence (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 3:11AM CDT until August 12 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Barton County in southwestern Missouri... Southwestern Cedar County in southwestern Missouri... Northern Lawrence County in southwestern Missouri... Northeastern Jasper County in southwestern Missouri... Dade County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 400 AM CDT. * At 311 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lamar, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Stockton Lake, Lamar, Greenfield, Lockwood, Jasper, Golden City, Miller, Nashville, Everton, Carytown, Dadeville, Jerico Springs, Lamar Heights, Halltown, South Greenfield, Irwin, Arcola, Chesapeake, Milford and Maple Grove. This includes the following highways... Interstate 44 between mile markers 50 and 58. Interstate 49 between mile markers 51 and 76. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
